Name: Categories
Expression: CALCULATE ( DISTINCTCOUNT ( Product[Category Id] ), CROSSFILTER ( 'Order Items'[Product Id], Product[Product Id], BOTH ) )

Name: Departments
Expression: CALCULATE ( DISTINCTCOUNT ( Category[Department Id] ), CROSSFILTER ( Product[Category Id], Category[Category Id], BOTH ), CROSSFILTER ( 'Order Items'[Product Id], Product[Product Id], BOTH ) )

Name: Profit
Expression: SUMX ( 'Order Items', 'Order Items'[Order Item Quantity] * RELATED ( Product[Product Price] ) * ( 1 - 'Order Items'[Order Item Discount Rate] ) * 'Order Items'[Order Item Profit Ratio] )

Name: Sales
Expression: SUMX ( 'Order Items', 'Order Items'[Order Item Quantity] * RELATED ( Product[Product Price] ) * ( 1 - 'Order Items'[Order Item Discount Rate] ) )
